SEARCH
Package fit

Class AccountManagement

java.lang.Object
fit.AccountManagement
public class AccountManagement extends Object
This class handles various account management operations such as updating personal details, managing accounts, and handling logging.

      public AccountManagement()

  • Method Details

    • updatePersonalDetails

      public static String updatePersonalDetails(String username, String age, String fitnessGoals)
      Updates the personal details of a user such as age and fitness goals.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to update.
      age - The updated age of the user.
      fitnessGoals - The updated fitness goals of the user.
      Returns:
      A success message or an error message if the update fails.

    • updateDietaryPreferences

      public static String updateDietaryPreferences(String username, String dietaryPreference)
      Updates the dietary preferences of a user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to update.
      dietaryPreference - The updated dietary preference to set.
      Returns:
      A success message if the operation is successful, or an error message if an exception occurs or if the user is not found.

    • updateUserEmail

      public static String updateUserEmail(String username, String newEmail)
      Updates the email of a user. This method is intended for admin use only.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to update.
      newEmail - The new email address to set for the user.
      Returns:
      A success message if the operation is successful, or an error message if an exception occurs or if the user is not found.

    • deleteUser

      public static String deleteUser(String username)
      Deletes a user account. This method is intended for admin use only.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to delete.
      Returns:
      A success message if the operation is successful, or an error message if an exception occurs or if the user is not found.

    • updatePassword

      public static String updatePassword(String username, String currentPassword, String newPassword)
      Updates the password for a user in both the client accounts file and the master accounts file.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to update.
      currentPassword - The current password of the user.
      newPassword - The new password to set for the user.
      Returns:
      A success message if both files are updated successfully, or an error message if the operation fails.

    • getAccount

      public static String getAccount(String username)
      Retrieves the details of a user account by username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The account details as a string if the user is found, or null if not found.
